Package universum.studios.android.support.universi

Provides 'universal' implementations of Activity and Fragment classes that may be used as base parents for all activities and fragments used across Android application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UniversiActivityContext
    Unified interface for activities provided by the Universi framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UniversiActivity
    An Activity implementation that provides Universi context features via UniversiActivityDelegate including other features described below.
    UniversiCompatActivity
    An AppCompatActivity implementation with same Universi context features provided as UniversiActivity.
    UniversiFragment
    An ActionBarFragment implementation that provides Universi context features via UniversiFragmentDelegate including other features described below.

Package universum.studios.android.support.universi Description

Provides 'universal' implementations of Activity and Fragment classes that may be used as base parents for all activities and fragments used across Android application. UniversiActivity along with UniversiFragment provide helper methods and callbacks to simplify data loading via content loaders, data binding using Android's Data Binding Library and also simplified showing of Fragments and DialogFragments and other useful features.
Author:
Martin Albedinsky
